segments.text: Excuse me ! I don't have time to waste . I've been here almost one full hour !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sorry , madam . You have to wait your turn . The parking lot is full .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Unbelievable ! Parking in this city is such a nightmare !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , gosh ! I have to go to the restroom so bad ! I can't bear it anymore !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm sure a spot will open up soon .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , look ! There's a spot open next to the public restroom ! Can I take it ?
segments.speaker: S1
